title: My queues are over 50mins!
body: So really I get bored waiting and do something else... I mean is that what every one is doing ? waiting 50mins to an hour for a game ??

replies.body: Seems to be ok now.. since the new 6.2 patch .. wonder why .. I am getting into games within 20mins still not as good as before but at least I get games :-)
What time are you entering the queue? If its past midnight all the school kids are already in bed...
Just tried one more time ... using "Fill"..  Queue is at 80mins and counting ....
thought i might try a treeline queue at this time at night I've restarted the queue like 4 times each at like 25-30 mins

I usually choose mid/sup .. sometimes top/mid. Before the reset I was B4 most of the time. after reset I got B5. this evening I gave up after 100mins queue.... would have been my second  game after getting assigned B5...
lol, average for me is like a minute. There have even been occasions where I got a match instantaneously after clicking Queue up.
that is weird cause the bronze population is high.
he is bronze 5, and probably bottom of the barrel for MMR
in plat i only got a 10 min wait
What roles are you choosing? I took Mid/Top earlier and had to wait 20 minutes before I re queued as something else and got in pretty quick.
